name: The Cream Blush
about: What it is:A buttery-soft, buildable cream blush and lip tint that melts into the skin for a naturally radiant finish..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, phthalates, and retinyl palmitate. It is also gluten-free and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This long-wearing, nonsticky formula is ultra-hydrating, courtesy of nourishing ingredients like avocado oil and aloe vera extract. Available in six unique shades, the pigments are buildable to your liking—from sheer to bold—and the formula is lightweight on the skin.
ingredients: Diisostearyl Malate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Isononyl Isononanoate, Mica, Octyldodecanol, Polyethylene, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Microcrystalline Wax, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Silica, Glyceryl Caprylate, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Diethylhexyl Syringylidenemalonate, Caprylyl Glycol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Sorbic Acid, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract. (+/-) Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Manganese Violet (CI 77742), Red 30 Lake (CI 73360), Red 40 Lake (CI 16035), Red 6 (CI 15850), Red 27 Lake (CI 45410), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77499), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Rub your finger in a circular motion to warm up the formula..-Once creamy, dot the product that’s on your finger on both cheeks..-Blend the formula out by tapping it into the skin using your finger or brush..-To increase the pigment, repeat steps two and three..-Too much pigment? Diffuse the color by tapping a beauty sponge over the blush...Pro Tip:.-For textured skin, apply blush after setting your foundation.

shades.shade_descriptor: cool-toned pink best suited for fair skin
